about_the_game:
"Rise & Muse" is a single-player game that blends RPG, deck-building, and Roguelike elements. Set in the land of Muse, you will engage in strategic battles against formidable enemies, unravel the seal of the male deity, defeat the goddess, and restore world order. With its unique three-deck combat mechanism, contract system, and the freedom to construct your own deck, this game offers a completely immersive gaming experience.
Note: The demo version includes the first level of the full version.

Three-Deck Combat Mechanism:
Rise possesses the special Sun Deck and Moon Deck, each with its own set of combat cards. During battles, you will simultaneously control cards from both decks, without any fixed patterns, allowing for innovative combinations. Share your deck-building strategies, as the next powerful style might emerge from your hands!

Stellar Deck:
Obtaining Stellar Cards is just the first step; unleashing them requires different Sun and Moon Cards. With limited deployment slots, balancing the number of chaotic cards and Sun/Moon cards becomes a crucial choice to make!

Freedom in Deck Construction:
If your damage output during battles is not ideal or if you wish to try out new combinations, you can freely construct your deck outside of combat! However, remember that fixed combinations may not be effective against all enemies; adaptability is the key to victory!

Unique Contract System:
How many cards to draw? How many action points to restore? What is the power of the cards played from your hand? The contracts you possess directly determine each attribute during battles. It's not about having the strongest contract; it's about smartly combining them to achieve victory.

Rich Storyline:
Every character you encounter has their own unique story. As you delve deeper into the game, you will gradually unravel the mysteries of the Muse continent and fulfill your mission in this adventure.

content_descriptors.notes: In some parts of the game's plot and visuals, there may be content such as "revealing clothing" and "sexual innuendo," which may not be suitable for all age groups.
